item.description:
OK Gang,

As you should know by now, this film is not a documentary about me!!! (Although, it would have been cool if it was!!) All kidding aside, I really enjoyed this film and I can not wait to see again. It works on so many levels. On the surface, it's a great kid's animated movie. But, just below the surface, it's a biting satire of the world of consumerism and where we are heading if we do not care of our planet.

For a review from the All Movie Guide, click here: All Movie Guide Link

The actual time of the Meetup is at 4:25. All "Maybe" RSVPs for this event will be changed to "No" as of Wednesday, July 23rd. I hope to see you nice people on Saturday.

WAL-ter
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in front of the screen after the show.
item.name: Wall-E at the Loews Boston Common
